page.title: 17LEYTON LIBRARY.
page.content: I go to Leyton Library which is on Leyton High Road. It costs nothing to get in.In the library there is a section for childrens books.Another section is for adults books,and the last section is for people to study or to read quietly. In the holidays the staff of the library present puppet shows and magic shows for the children. If you want to join the library you have to fill in a form on which you put your name,address and telephone number.On your next visit you will get tickets.Children usually get 4 tickets and adults will get 2 or 3 or even 4. I enjoy the library very much and a lot of the little children enjoy the pictures on the walls.
